param.name: damping
param.description: Damping factor (between 0.5 and 1) is the extent to which the current value is maintained relative to incoming values (weighted 1 - damping). This in order to avoid numerical oscillations when updating these values (messages).

param.name: max_iter
param.description: Maximum number of iterations of the k-means algorithm for a single run.

param.name: convergence_iter
param.description: Number of iterations with no change in the number of estimated clusters that stops the convergence

param.name: affinity
param.description: Which affinity to use. At the moment precomputed and euclidean are supported. euclidean uses the negative squared euclidean distance between points.
